title: Bar & lounge font
content:
I cannot ID this font and have tried both whatfontis and whatthefont

comments.content:
You should try also [Find my Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006152017/http:/www.findmyfont.com/) ;)  
It's **[VOL](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006152017/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=VOL%20-%20Regular&fid=c23d2d1f69102269763109e461cb0558&fsize=60&text=bar%20%26%20lounge&fit=1)** free font by Ezza Adhreza
